description: Number of topologies on n labeled points satisfying the T_4 axiom.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Herman Jamke, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..19
M. Erné, Struktur- und Anzahlformeln für Topologien auf Endlichen Mengen, Manuscripta Math., 11 (1974), 221-259.
formula: E.g.f.: A4(X) = exp(Z4(X)-1) where Z4(x) denotes the e.g.f. for A006058. - Herman Jamke, Mar 02 2008
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Mar 02 2008
More precise definition from _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 09 2014
